name: Beyond The Evil
description:
Pennsylvania, 2019. Gary Nephew, one private investigator got one strange call in the morning at his apartment from one supposed person dying and got in charge of the investigation of the person's house. At the time of the investigation, he found the caller dead body and some important stuff to research the killer's fingerprints. After sending all the evidence to his partner Lukas Smith, Gary didn't even imagined what was coming by...


After Two Hours, Gary's partner finished all the research and found out that the supposed killer is called Matthew Juniper. Unfortunately, Matthew disappeared a few years ago and there's no record of where he lived, but at the same time Lukas had the luck of finding the house of Matthew's brother, Dresden Juniper. In the investigation of Matthew's brother house, Gary found some strange letters involving some lab projects, craziness and dead members of the family. After that, Gary got the mission to get Matthew as soon as possible, before any strange experiment gets released out.



- Interact with a huge amount objects spread out in the scene.
- Deep dive in multiple scenes with one big immersion and great graphics.
- Be inside one deep campaign, with multiple puzzles and objects to be found and investigated.
- Stay alert of some little jumpscares in the game.
